User name to be displayed when the menu is opened from the top left Show your login email address when you open the menu from the top left corner Quit the application when starting up a browser, etc. If you want to return to this app after the browser or other devices have been launched, turn it off. Failed to retrieve your Google Account information. You have signed in with %s. Do you want to log out? Logged out. Unable to activate the shortcut.
Please check your registration details. A shortcut has been created for Home. No synchronization was done because the communication failed. All data in sync. All data has been synchronized.
Please enter your email address and contact details. I will always review your comments, but I may not be able to respond to all of them. 
I will not be able to respond to all of them. 

After I receive your inquiry, a confirmation email will be sent to you. 
Please set up to receive emails from "info@ambitious-i.net". email address Please enter in the email address format. Inquiry details Please enter your inquiry. Send Inquiries are now accepted. Could not send it.
Add a bookmark. Update your bookmark. Add a folder. Update the folder name. Folder name Title URL Enter a folder name. . Enter a title. . Enter the URL correctly. . Cancel Add Update Delete Selecting the destination folder Move folder name bookmarks Updated %s. Added %s. Do you want to delete %s? This operation is irreversible. The bookmarks in the folder will also be deleted.
If you are sharing, it will also be deleted from the person you are sharing it with.
This operation is irreversible. Deleted. Moved I saved the sort. The sort has been cancelled. Update the image. Update all images.
You must be logged in to share.
Click on "Sign In" in the left menu and sign in with your Google Account.
The notification could not be loaded due to a communication failure.
Try to update it in a place with good electric field conditions.
Select destination Use contact information Save Permission to access the site is required to select from the contact list. Shared email address Set the permissions for getting contact information from "Allow" in the app information. Application Information Cancel Invalid email address. Because it is an invalid email address, it will not be shared with the following email addresses. Please note that this app cannot be shared with any other contact except Gmail (including G Suite). Do you want to discard the changes?
Your changes will not be saved. Discard You have saved your shares.
Notifications from the App Notice while working with the server Updating… Images are being updated… Thank you for downloading our app!
Each function can be confirmed from "How to use" in the left menu. How to use Later
Privacy Policy Terms of Use Version Contact Us Update all data This feature is for emergency use only.
Please refrain from using it unless you are informed by the administrator.

Do you want to delete all data on the device and get all data from the server? Execute with understanding Failed to load.
Please check your communication environment.
Tap to share! Tap the top right corner of the browser to open the menu and select Share. Select ShareBookmarks! Select our application "ShareBookmarks" from the sharing menu. Add URL! Check the title and URL and tap Add. Addition complete! The bookmark will be added as an arrow. (Image may not be set depending on the site.) Share the folder! Select "Share Folder" from the folder's menu. Set share destination! Enter the Google email address of the person you want to share with, and tap the checkbox in the upper right corner to share the bookmarks in the folder. (You can also search for the email address in your address book.
FAQ Do you have any of the following problems? Inquire directly
